ComicInfo.Summary:
When war threatens the Moonshae Isles, legendary heroes return to defeat the forces of an unthinkable foe.
Enter Hoondarrh: the Red Rage of Mintarn; the Sleeping Wyrm of Skadaurak; a Red dragon of legendary size, cunning, and strength. None shall prevail against his might.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Tess Fowler (a) & Tamra Bonvillain (c) | 1 | B | Character Sheet Cover B | Tess Fowler | 2-3 | RI-A | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover A | Ibrahem Swaid | 4 | RI-B | 1:25 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover B | Tess Fowler | 5 |
